original_text: Then the king's young men who attended him said, “Let beautiful young virgins be sought out for the king.
korean_text: 왕의 측근 신하들이 아뢰되 왕은 왕을 위하여 아리따운 처녀들을 구하게 하시되

sentences.original_text: Then the king's young men who attended him
“Let beautiful young virgins be sought out for the king.
